BNC User Reference Guide

<samplingDecl>

samplingDecl (sampling declaration) contains a prose description of the rationale and methods used in sampling texts in the creation of a corpus or collection.
Class model.encodingPart att.declarable
Declaration 
element samplingDecl { ( text | para )* }
Attributes
(Global attributes and those inherited from [att.declarable ] )
Example
 <samplingDecl
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">
  <para>Definitive information on the sampling policies applied during construction of the BNC is provided in the associated documentation...</para>
 </samplingDecl>
; ;
Module header
